attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its time our government looked in to what is clearly a cartel operation going on with our energy companies. With oil now lower than it was in April and the energy companies insisting that prices still need to increase, it is clear that the current system is being abused and that the government that is currently in place is doing nothing to stop this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
